tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE policy_expirations (
    policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    homeowner_name VARCHAR,
    expiration_date DATE,
    reminder_sent BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Policy (policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              homeowner_id INT,
              policy_type VARCHAR,
              expiration_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE Homeowner (homeowner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                 homeowner_name VARCHAR,
                 contact_email VARCHAR,
                 contact_phone VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE RenewalReminder (reminder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                    policy_id INT,
                    reminder_date TIMESTAMP,
                    status VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE RenewalLog (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                policy_id INT,
                renewal_date TIMESTAMP,
                renewal_successful BOOLEAN);
